EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-05-22 Turbo 6-1 Prospects Last Chance.Prospect Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Using AI to Maximize Cloud Cost Savings | Webinar | Last Chance to Register
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-artificial-intelligence-to-cut-cloud-costs/?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTm1abFpqWXdaVFl3WVRrMyIsInQiOiJkUXJWemFHKzd0QUdDQWJpanRsMytKZGg3c2ltNVBHaVdhZDl0bEJ3QlwvdGM3ZmtNN2V4M2wwRlhMeERVM2RnNVpIOUt1MFFOYitKRFNJdm9nVjFlWmc9PSJ9]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
This is your last chance! Don't miss our live webinar on Wednesday, May 23rd at 1pm ET. Join Mor Cohen-Tal, our Cloud CTO, as she discusses Using AI to Continuously Maximize Cloud Cost Savings. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-artificial-intelligence-to-cut-cloud-costs/]]>
During the webinar, you will learn how to continuously optimize reserved instance utilization in concert with resizing automation – to drive the elasticity AND cost savings you want and expect from the cloud.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
PS - If you can't join the live webinar, feel free to sign up anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-artificial-intelligence-to-cut-cloud-costs/]]>, and we'll email you the recording afterwards.
